Project description

Collection of useful middlewares for aiohttp.web applications.

  • Works on Python 3.7+

  • Works with aiohttp.web 3.8.1+

  • BSD licensed

  • Latest documentation on Read The Docs

  • Source, issues, and pull requests on GitHub

Quick Start

By default aiohttp.web does not provide many built-in middlewares forstandart web-development needs such as: handling errors, shielding viewhandlers, or providing CORS headers.

aiohttp-middlewares tries to fix this by providing several middlewares thataims to cover most common web-development needs.

For example, to enable CORS headers for http://localhost:8081 origin andhandle errors for aiohttp.web application you need to,

from aiohttp import webfrom aiohttp_middlewares import (    cors_middleware,    error_middleware,)app = web.Application(    middlewares=(        cors_middleware(origins=("http://localhost:8081",)),        error_middleware(),    ))

Check documentation forall available middlewares and available initialization options.
